markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1539) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=322" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.

</column>

---

You split your attacks. Make two melee Strikes, one with each required weapon, each against a different foe. If the second Strike is made with a non-[agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) weapon, it takes a –2 penalty. Increase your multiple attack penalty only after attempting both Strikes.
name: Dual Finisher
requirement: You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.
requirement_markdown: You wield two melee weapons, one in each hand.
